item.title: Helper method to generate nested tags from block
item.description: I’m still pretty new to Ruby on Rails. Hopefully one day I’ll know enough to be able to look back and slap myself on the forehead for struggling with these issues. Right now our views generate a menu from a simple set of links: <%= link_to "foo", "#" %> <%= link_to "bar", "#" %> I’d like to convert them to a drop-down menu that looks like this: <div class="dropdown"> <a class="dropdown-toggle" href="#"><i class="caret"></i></a> <ul class="dropdown-menu"> <li><%= link_to "foo", "#" %></li> <li><%= link_to "bar", "#" %></li> </ul> </div> I’d like to minimize the changes to the markup as much as possible.
